jd: From: Ashish Kumar, THEMESOFT INC ashish@themesoft.com Reply to: ashish@themesoft.com Job Title: Scrum Master (BFSI Domain) Location: San Antonio, TX (Onsite) Job Description: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Scrum Master with a strong background in the Banking, Financial Services, and Insurance (BFSI) domain to join our team in San Antonio, TX. As a Scrum Master, you will be responsible for ensuring that agile principles and practices are effectively followed by the team and driving the successful delivery of projects in an onsite capacity. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, stakeholders, and product owners to ensure smooth project execution. Key Responsibilities: Facilitate daily Scrum ceremonies (stand-ups, sprint planning, sprint reviews, and retrospectives) to ensure the team's adherence to Agile principles. Coach and mentor teams on Agile methodologies, helping to identify opportunities for process improvements.
